issue.title: Broken links to signatures/hashes etc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1936](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1936). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Links to KEYS, sigs and hashes must use the ASF host, not the mirrors, as such files are deliberately not mirrored.

i.e. use

http://www.apache.org/dist/arrow/KEYS
https://www.apache.org/dist/arrow/arrow-0.8.0/apache-arrow-0.8.0.tar.gz.sha512
etc.

The download page needs to include a link to the KEYS file (the asc file is no use without it) and should provide details of how to check sigs and hashes, for example:

https://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi#verify
